title: Peds Nappy Rash 50G Cream
details: This medication is used to treat and prevent diaper rash and other minor skin irritations.
precautions: Use with caution having skin infection in the affected area.
effects: It has not serious side effects.

title: Cutipro 60G Cream
details: Cutipro is a barrier cream to protect against friction and moisture.

precautions: Use with caution having skin infection in the affected area.
